channel.title: Dotnettips.wordpress.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Dotnettips.wordpress.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Collection Performance: Enhancing Dictionary Performance with FrozenDictionary
item.description: The FrozenDictionary is a thread-safe, immutable, read-only dictionary optimized for fast lookups. It outperforms the Dictionary, reducing iteration and lookup times significantly. Link to article: https://dotnettips.wordpress.com/2024/06/09/collection-performance-enhancing-dictionary-performance-with-frozendictionary/

item.title: DotNetDave Rocks On .NET Live: Performance Improvements in .NET 8
item.description: On June 10th, 2024 at 9 AM PST, I'll be appearing on "On.NET Live" for the second time. We'll delve into code performance in .NET 8 through the Code Performance Game. Join the live show for an engaging session. For more details, visit https://youtu.be/4WX14dsnKsg. Link to article: https://dotnettips.wordpress.com/2024/06/08/dotnetdave-rocks-on-net-live-performance-improvements-in-net-8/
